meanings.definition: Examine (a part of the body) by touch, especially for medical purposes.
meanings.sent1: The doctor palpates the patient's abdomen to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: She gently palpates the fruit to determine its ripeness.
meanings.sent3: The detective palpates the crime scene for any hidden clues.
meanings.sent4: His fingers palpate the guitar strings, creating a melodious tune.
meanings.sent5: The blindfolded person tries to palpate and guess the object in their hands.

meanings.definition: Touch or feel (something) with the hands.
meanings.sent1: The child palpates the soft fur of the kitten with delight.
meanings.sent2: He palpates the fabric to assess its quality before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: She palpates the dough to ensure it is ready for baking.
meanings.sent4: The artist palpates the clay, shaping it into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The hiker palpates the rough bark of the tree as he explores the forest.
